channel.title: Maury
channel.desc: Katrina thinks her much-older fiance has been unfaithful to her with multiple women; Nicole says she kicked out her boyfriend after learning he is a cheater and a thief; Sabrina says her husband emotionally checked out after she gave birth to twins.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Karamo
channel.desc: Karamo is a true fan of the talk-show genre who brings that passion, a unique skill set and life experiences to guide his guests through life's dramatic crossroads and build a lasting connection with the daytime audience.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
channel.desc: The former Chicago cop and security guard of "The Jerry Springer Show" gets his own talk show that is adapted from the popular "Steve to the Rescue" shows he did while filling in for Springer. Wilkos says he hopes his show will provide him with a platform to stand up for everyday people and help viewers in need. Common topics include trying to confirm - often using results of lie-detector tests - whether guests abused or molested children. Steve also helps guests determine paternity and if guests are cheating on their partners. If Steve doesn't like the guests they might not last long on the show.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: GMFB: Overtime
channel.desc: Catch up on everything NFL with the latest news, highlights, and player and celebrity interviews with informative and fun discussions on trending topics from across the football world and beyond.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: In Depth With Graham Bensinger
channel.desc: Past "In Depth" guests including Jon Hamm, Jayson Tatum, and Arnold Schwarzenegger reflect on the hardships that didn't define them, but instead helped fuel their success.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Family Feud Favorites
channel.desc: "Family Feud" has seen some crazy moments over the years, so buckle up as we revisit these fan favorites.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Judge Mathis
channel.desc: A woman sues her former friend, who says she once walked in on the plaintiff assaulting her boyfriend.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The People's Court
channel.desc: "Tow Trouble.".

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Crime Expos? With Nancy O'Dell
channel.desc: Taking viewers through all aspects of a murder investigation.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Divorce Court
channel.desc: Alyssa says her husband is taking advantage of her - she says they used to split the household bills 50/50, and now, it's more like 80/20, and she believes he is spending his money on another woman.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: After Murray takes Erica's car privileges away, she and Barry retaliate by purchasing a used van; Adam is disappointed when he is voted "nicest guy" in the yearbook.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: Beverly and Murray move Erica into her dorm, where her roommate is also named Erica; Adam tries to give Barry the perfect girlfriend.
